detail_desc: Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats around the neckline, a small opening with press-studs at the back of the neck and a seam with concealed elastication at the waist. Lined. The polyester content of the outer layer is partly recycled.
Nightshirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-style T-shirt in jersey made from an airy linen and viscose blend with a round neck.
Bohemian blouse in soft, slub cotton jersey with a woven elasticated flounce with broderie anglaise at the top.
Fitted jumper in a ribbed cotton blend with a high collar and long sleeves with a slit.
Skirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and two tiers. Sewn-in pants with elastication and decorative gathers at the hems.
Warm-lined ankle boots in soft imitation suede with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles (soft soles in sizes 0-1).
Scarf in an airy weave with fringes along the sides.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and short legs. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.

Short dress in chiffon and flock-print mesh. Round neckline with an opening and ties at the front and long puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a small frill trim and gathered tiers on the skirt for added width and soft draping. Partly lined in jersey.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringe trims along the sides. Size 90x190 cm.

One-shoulder dress in plumeti chiffon with a glittery thread pattern. Two flounces at the top, one shoulder strap with a decorative bow, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounced hem. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless top in printed cotton jersey with frill-trimmed shoulder straps.
Briefs in ribbed jersey with a mid waist, wide elastic waistband, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Tops in organic cotton jersey, one block-coloured and one in a solid colour. Both tops have gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Tunic in soft, organic cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with raw edges. Seam and a narrow tie belt under the bust and flared tiers to the hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket at the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Boots in imitation leather with a zip in the side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.

Short fitted dress in airy chiffon with a small stand-up collar and V-neck at the front. Deep V-neck at the back with a concealed zip and a tie at the neck. Gently flared skirt and long sleeves with wide cuffs with three covered buttons. Partial jersey lining.
Dress in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Thin, metal hoop earrings. Length 4.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with plastic beads and hole embroidery on the shoulders.
Sleeveless top in satin with a layer of sequin-embroidered mesh over the front. Back in a viscose weave with buttons at the back of the neck.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a gathered skirt.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with a back in lining fabric. Buttons down the front, welt front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Super skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Fitted T-shirt in airy cotton jersey.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered detail on the front and an adjustable strap with a metal fastening at the back.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with short, flounced sleeves.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Boxer shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes, decorated with sparkly stones. Diameter from 1 cm to 2 cm.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey. Straight cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps.
Short T-shirt dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in ribbed microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a contrasting colour ribbed trim around the neckline and sleeves.

Imitation leather sandals with wide, crossover straps at the front, an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Trainers in imitation suede and crocodile-patterned imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Cardigan in a soft, loose, textured knit with 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Straight-cut top with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and a chest pocket.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather sections, a lightly padded edge, glittery elasticated lacing at the front and a small fabric appliqué on the tongue. Glittery heel cap and loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester, and glittery, patterned soles.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with a magnetic fastener and two handles that have a tie detail at each end. Imitation suede lining in a contrasting colour. Size approx. 14.5x27x34 cm.

Bomber jacket in a woven nylon blend with a thin hood that can be folded and zipped into the stand-up collar. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket, zipped front pockets and an inner pocket with a concealed press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Twill joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, pleats at the top and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets, a low crotch and tapered legs.

Nursing top in soft, stretch fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with a functional fastening for easier nursing access and an elasticated hem. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with long raglan sleeves that have lace panels at the top.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft jersey with woven details, a collar and button placket. Chest pocket with a button on the front, buttoned cuffs and press-studs at the crotch.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Super Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Short, boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave made from an organic cotton blend with inset hole embroidery. Deep, frill-trimmed V-neck, long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top and slits in the sides.
Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a metal chain and imitation leather shoulder strap. Two compartments with a zip at the top. Lined. Depth 6 cm. Height 11 cm. Width 18 cm.
Top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at one side, and 3/4-length sleeves.
Chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
V-neck T-shirt in cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed viscose jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with an opening and press-studs at one side and press-studs at the crotch.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Slim-fit trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a regular waist and zip fly and button. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with slits in the sides and no buttons.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, concealed zip down the back and long, wide puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Frill-trimmed seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Longer at the back. Partly lined.
Sun hats in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined.
Base layer set in soft, ribbed jersey. Top with long raglan sleeves, a small stand-up collar and ribbed cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short, flared dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the top, and a gathered seam at the hem. Unlined.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with ear flaps and ties under the chin. Cotton jersey lining.
Hard smartphone case in marble-patterned plastic. Fits iPhone 6/6S/7/8.
